Subject: Jre?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=188703988

Hi,

I got someone to install Heritrix on a machine for me. I just 
gave them the user manual link. Following the instructions in 
there they simply installed a JRE. However it won't run with 
just a JRE - the web interface needs a full JAVA to compile 
jsp pages:

"HTTP ERROR: 500
Unable+to+compile+class+for+JSP%0A%0AAn+error+occurred+at+line%3A+%2D1+in+th
e+jsp+file%3A+null%0A%0AGenerated+servlet+error%3A%0A++++%5Bjavac%5D+Compili
ng+1+source+file%0A%0A%0A

RequestURI=/"

I've just read the bit in the manual about installing Heritrix and 
it definately implies that only a JRE will do the job so I guess 
thats a documentation bug. I'll raise it as a bug but I've only 
just woken up and before coffee bug forms are too scary ;-). I'll
do it in a bit. 

cheers 

mark
